price: (24) To Pharaoh, Hāmān and Qārūn, but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
